DESCRIPTION: Capture the latest card that appeared.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: This command is used as a part of the trading card game. There are a limited amount of games that support this feature. If you wish to have a game added please contact us on our support server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: The {{prefix}}capture command can only be used correctly by one person after a card appears. You can try as many times as you like but only one person can capture the card.
ALIASES: Capture does not have any aliases.
NOTHING_AVAILABLE: There is nothing to capture at the moment.
TITLE: Type **{{prefix}}capture myname** with the correct name to obtain the card!
GUESS: The first to guess my name will obtain my card!
